title: Pre-UFYB 6: Dealing with Difficult Clients
itunes:title: Pre-UFYB 6: Dealing with Difficult Clients
description:
This week on The Lawyer Stress Solution, we’re delving into the ins and outs of working with difficult clients. Join us as I talk about two different ways that difficult clients can cause stress, and share actionable tools and strategies to help you manage both your clients and your own brain better.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://bit.ly/2qPK3P5
